faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Still have questions? Our customer support team is here to help you with your bus ticket booking.

q1.question: How do I book a ticket?
q1.answer: Search for your route, fill in passenger information, click book, complete payment, then confirm your seat selection.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We currently accept Chapa payment gateway which supports CBE, Awash Bank, Abyssinia Bank, and other major Ethiopian banks.

q3.question: Can I choose a seat before payment?
q3.answer: When you book, one seat will be reserved for you until the payment time expires. After completing payment, you can then choose your preferred seat.
